column1: on a length, just outside off, allowed to angle through to Saha
on a length, outside off, left alone
good carry. On a length, outside off, collected almost head high by Saha
full, just outside off, Renshaw in two minds, whether to play or leave. In the end the ball hits the bat as he is looking to leave. The ball rolls towards point
on a length, pretty straight, swinging towards off, and defended from the crease
full and straight, and this defensive push goes for four. This outfield is lightning quick. He pushes this wide of mid-on, and Ashwin can only escort it all the way to the fence
short of a length, on the pads, tucked away for a couple towards deep square

where has this kicked off from? Short of a length, on off, jumps at him. Warner does well to not follow it with his hands. Head high for Saha. Is this because of the early moisture that Lee talked about at the pitch report?
down the leg side, off the pad to Saha. Half a shout
short of a length, no pace off the pitch, and defended by Warner
again slow off the surface. Short of a length, and Warner has to wait for the ball to arrive. Defends
short of a length, straight, punched to mid-off
full and straight, Renshaw right behind it in defence
full again, Renshaw shapes up to drive, but then stays inside its line. Allows it to go through to Saha

big big lbw shout. Is this full enough to pitch within the stumps and hit the stumps? Called not-out, and India don't review. There is no swing, and is hitting him in front of middle. Replays show it pitches clearly outside leg. Ishant has done well here by telling Kohli not to review it
on a length and straight, solidly defended this time by Renshaw
gets a touch too full and on the pads, and Renshaw has clipped this between mid-on and midwicket for four more. Don't bother chasing these on this outfield
full on the pads again, but this time Renshaw has found the man at midwicket. He will feel has lost out on four runs
short of a length, on off, punched sweetly but straight to square cover
straight, short of a length, Warner right behind it
fuller, on off, pushed wide of mid-off, and hares through for a single
full toss, just a push from Renshaw, and Ashwin at mid-off is surprised by the pace of the outfield again. He has to put in a dive to save four runs. Well done in the end
short of a length, outside off, and steered away between gully and point. No third man in pace
full and straight, stays a touch low, and Renshaw defends it solidly
length ball, on the pads, tucked away past midwicket for a couple
full, just outside off, driven to mid-off
on a length, on off, defended from the crease
half-volley, driven straight of mid-off for a single
another four for Renshaw. He has scored 16, and all in boundaries. Length ball, pitches outside leg, and he tucks it away off the pad. Beats midwicket, and the outfield does the rest
on a length, on off, Renshaw in two minds whether to play or leave. Ends up being squared and guiding it to the slips. On the bounce

short of a length, tucked away off the hip, and is that outfield quick or what? Pujara has to put in the long chase, and they take the third on the throw. On another outfield this would have been just one
short of a length, outside off, gets a bit of bounce and Renshaw stays inside its line. He looks for a glance fine, but is beaten
good carry into his armpit. Renshaw is beaten again, but gets a leg-bye this time
Warner will feel he has missed out. Full ball on the pads, and he gets just the leg-bye. Early into the flick
long half-volley, and driven scorchingly through cover. Renshaw reaches 20, all in boundaries
short of a length, angling in, Renshaw tall in defence
Warner drives the first ball on the up, into the shin pad of silly point
slower in the air, Warner lets this one through. Good turn and bounce. Is this the early moisture?
tossed up, just outside off, Warner defends off the front foot
nice dip from Ashwin. Slow too, at 79ks. Defended off the front foot
short but stays low. Warner does well to cut it in time. It has hit a dark patch and not bounced much. Gets a single

Renshaw continues to deal in fours. Ashwin slightly too full, slightly too straight, and he clips this off his toes. Beats midwicket, and the chase from Pujara and Vijay, who has run to his right from fine leg. This is a really really quick outfield
length ball, angling in, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
now they have a deep forward square leg to deny Renshaw the boundary. Tucks this length ball away, and gets a couple to deep midwicket. His first non-boundary runs
on a length, outside off, and he runs this to third man for a single
Warner's first boundary. Umesh bowls full. Too full. And he crunches this through cover
short of a length, angling in, defended off the back foot
this length ball stops at him. Played uppishly towards square cover
slow off the pitch. Renshaw looks for a repeat of the last ball of the last over, but this one doesn't come on and takes the leading edge. No gully, though
more on off this time, and defended back to him
flat and quick, but full. Renshaw caught defending a full ball off the back foot but does well
tossed up outside off, and left alone
flatter, shorter, punched back to him off the back foot
fuller, pushed to the left of short straight cover. Kohli fumbles to allow them a single
on a length, outside off, defended back
full, outside off, mistimes this drive, and gets a single wide of mid-off
tossed up wide, and Warner drives it with an open face. Easy pickings for Warner there

what a catch from Jadeja. This is such a weird wicket. The little bit of luck India needed. A full toss from Jadeja, Warner should be hitting this for four, but ends up slicing this back at good pace. The thing about this catch is, after you bowl such a fullie you are looking at which part of the ground is this being dispatched to. Jadeja, though, is alert and pouches this
on a length, on off, defended from the crease
forward-defensive from Smith. To silly point on a bounce
defended off the front foot
stays back to keep out a flat length ball
slower in the air, but not full enough to bring him forward. Defended from the crease
really full, middle and leg, pushed back to Ashwin
on a length, middle and leg, punched to midwicket
tossed up nicely, hits the inside half of the bat as Renshaw defends off the front foot
full, middle and leg. Slow pitch, difficult to time it, and finds mid-on
Smith off the mark with a four. Jadeja fires this into the pads. He gets inside the line and glances this through fine leg
on a length, some dip, and Smoith defends in front of his body
full, Smith drives wristily, and plays it back to Jadeja
full, middle and leg, defended back to him
flatter, and Smith stays back to defend
flat, short of a length, defended to leg

driven on the up. His reach and his hands do the job. He leans in and drives this along the ground, and to the right of short straight cover. There is a long-off in place, but this outfield takes it away from him
too full, driven to long-off for one
down the wicket, gets too close to the ball and plays it back to Ashwin
nice loop outside off, draws a forward-defensive
too short, but the pitch is slow so he has to shelve the cut. He goes back to punch it to long-on for one
some turn from middle and leg. Defended off the front foot
on a length, on off, makes him defend again
Smith goes back to defend a length ball
full, outside off, and the ball stops to make him mistime the drive. Mid-off does the fielding
down the wicket to play an extravagant flick for a single to square leg
some turn on a length ball from outside off. Hits the inside half of the bat
stays back to defend a length-ball offbreak
slight shimmy to a drifting offbreak. He has to play defensively because it has drifted away
stays back for a shortish offbreak. Stays a touch low, but he manages to work it to leg for one
on a length, on off, driven to the right of Ashwin for a single. He puts in a dive but is not quick enough
stays back to keep out a length-ball offbreak
slow off the surface, and he goes back to punch this down for a single
on a length, middle and off, defended off the front foot
slower through the air, less turn than the last time, hits the inside half of the bat
stays back for a flat delivery, but can't beat the man at point with his punch
full, half-volley, driven well, but extra cover prevents any runs
excellent shot. Against the turn and still all along the ground. On a length, middle and leg, and he punch-drives this. Beats midwicket to his right, and it hurtles away on this quick outfield
corrects the line. Defended outside off
goes back to a flat length ball, and works this to leg for no runs
full, drifting in, pushed to mid-on
slight forward movement to defend a length-ball offbreak
wider outside off, Renshaw trusts the pitch and pushes with an open face
flatter, shorter, and he goes back to punch this wide of midwicket for one
flat, middle and leg, quicker through the air, and Smith defends from the crease
on a length, turning in, driven to long-on for one
some turn from a length just outside off. Smith uses soft hands in defence
down the wicket, beaten in the air, but he gets a single off the thick outside edge of the bat
on a length, outside off, punched back to Jadeja
slightly too straight and he drives it down to long-on for one
slower in the air, on off, Smith defends this watchfully
short, doesn't come on, punched to short cover
on a length, flat, on off, defended from the crease
slight dip outside off, defended off the front foot
flighted outside off, driven to wide long-off for a single
short of a length, no room, punched to short straight midwicket

that is just a flurry of wrists. This is tossed up outside off, Smith is not to the pitch of the ball and still looks to cover-drive using his wrists to keep it down. The ball runs off the outer half of the bat and goes fine of point. This shot shows how much Smith is trusting this pitch

big big shout. More for lbw than catch, but there is a double play here. Not given on the field, and India don't review. Full, Renshaw looks for the drive, the ball beats his drive, hits the pad, and goes to slip. There is an explosion off the pitch, baby. Impact outside off, but the ball still turning enough to miss the stumps
flat, into the pads, defended
lap sweep. No short fine leg, so he can afford to play this in the air
flat outside off, defended back to him
solid front-foot defensive to end the over
full and straight, defended from the crease
full again, on off, defended to cover
length ball, angling in, Renshaw defends from the crease
wide length ball, he pushes at it with an open face for a single to deep point
full and straight, slight tail back in, defended from the crease
full, swinging in, and defended from the crease. This ball might be reversing a little
full, on off, pushed back to him
slower in the air, gets the ball to dip, draws a forward-defensive
drift into the pads, Renshaw looks to play to let, and gets a leading edge back to Ashwin. Falls short
flatter, quicker, Renshaw goes back to dab on it for a single
stays back to defend a length-ball offbreak
stays back to defend another flat offbreak
length ball, into the pads, whipped away to deep midwicket for a couple
nearly there. Short of a length, outside off, he opens the face on it, and it nearly carries to second slip. Rahane there is standing closer than usual, and takes this on the half-volley

as in Pune, Umesh produces a breakthrough after a good start from Australia. Renshaw has played a poor shot twice in a row. Almost slips catching practice here. Length ball outside off, holds its line with the shine, which is away from Renshaw. He just opens the face, and Kohli hangs on to one at first slip
on a length, 144ks, hits the outside half of the defensive bat and they take a single
takes this length ball off the stumps and works it into the leg side for a couple
on a length, straight, stays a touch low, and he works this to leg still. Gets a single
casual from Ashwin. On a length, pushed back to his right, and Ashwin looks to field it with the foot and conedes a single
full, middle and leg, defended back to Ashwin
quicker, into the pads, beats the inside edge but they get a leg-bye
stays back for a fullish offbreak. Keeps it out
down the wicket, back at Ashwin, but he is a little slow in getting his hand down. The quick outfield means long-on has some work to do. They get two
full outside off, pushed to mid-off
full, on off, Marsh is watchful in defence
wider length ball this time, and Marsh lets it go

what is happening here? Now Marsh plays a ball he should not be playing. Short of a length, outside off, straightens a touch. Marsh is squared up, gets an edge, but this one doesn't carry. Kohli does well to dive to his left and save runs
short of a length, angling in, drops this towards point for a single
full and straight, defended off the back foot
short of a length, outside off, Smith gets one to punch away, but can't beat the man at point

big big shout for bat-pad, not given and India have reviewed it immediately. Good drift on this, making Marsh play around his front pad. The ball pitches middle and leg, the drift making him play not under his eye. The ball turns but only a touch, and straightens to take the inside edge. It flies off the bad, and Pujara dives to his left to take a sharp catch. Really good offspin bowling, really good catch, and a really good review
half-volley first up, and he drives it beautifully between mid-off and cover
flatter, Handscomb not sure whether to go forward or stay back. Defends off the crease
down the wicket to drive this length ball to long-on for one
full, middle and leg, clipped past midwicket for one
down the wicket for another beautiful push-drive for a single wide of mid-off
lbw shout with a reversing inswinger. Not given. India don't review. Going down, I think. Definite reverse swing there, hopping back in late. Going down still
on a length, straight again, and defended to leg
tailing in again, Handscomb on the crease and defends
think he reversed the shine this time. Holds its line in front of off. Defended solidly
dipping inswinging full ball. Clipped to midwicket
again seems to have tries to bowl an outswinger. Holds its line outside off. Left alone. Only the second maiden on the innings
length ball, middle and leg, defended back to him
goes back to work a flat ball to leg. Can't beat short leg
full, on off, defended back to Jadeja
flatter, short of a length, outside off, punched back to Jadeja
tossed up, on off, solid defence from Smith
full, middle and leg, driven to wide long-on for one
full, just outside off, swinging in, punched to mid-off

what a shot. He has played this between his legs, but not intentionally. This is full and swinging in late. Smith is on the back foot and looks to whip it after taking the front foot out of the way. The inside edge goes between his two legs for four to fine leg
what a shot, and I mean it genuinely now. Plays this reversing ball really late, closes the bat face at the last moment, and manages to beat the man at square leg. Great timing and quick outfield
shuffling across again, and this time he gets a leg-bye off the thigh pad
accurate reversing inswinger. Defended in front of off and middle
wide outside off, and left alone
full, middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
flat, into the pads, goes back to work this to long leg for two
some dip, on a length, middle and leg, defended back to him
nice dip, hits the inside half of the bat as Smith defends. Gets a single to leg
on the crease, and defends in front of his body
nice dip and turn. Handscomb right forward to defend
short, wide, but the ball doesn't come on and Smith can't execute the punch shot properly
short of a length, just outside off, he shuffles across to defend this back
again shuffles across to defend one short of a length
Ishant again stays short of a length and just outside off. Smith shuffles across to defend
fuller, outside off, shuffles back and across to defend this back to Ishant
India start with a maiden. Short of a length, just outside off. Defended
short of a length, just outside off, slow off the surface, pushed to mid-off
flat, into the pads, worked away for a single
full, on off, pushed to short straight cover
half-volley on off, driven to extra cover
flatter, punched away off the back foot, but finds the man at extra cover
full, middle and leg, pushed straight to Vijay at mid-on, and they steal a single. A loud 'come on yaar' from Kohli
short of a length, slightly wider than what he bowled last over, and he dabs this to deep point for one
short of a length, angling in towards off, defended from the crease
misses out on runs here. Full, swinging down the leg side, misses, but gets two leg-byes fine of fine leg
stays back to defend a full ball with an open face. Better length from Ishant after bowling an over of shortish deliveries
beauty from Ishant. On a length, just outside off, Handscomb plays the angle, but the ball holds its line to beat the bat
full and straight, defended from the crease
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, still whips across this, and gets a single off the inside half of the bat. Goes in the air but there is no man at square leg
full, no turn, hits the inside half of the bat as Handscomb defends
down the wicket, gets right to the pitch of the ball, hits to midwicket
slower in the air, 85ks, on off, defended off the front foot
down the wicket, clips this off his toes for a single to deep square leg
on a length, on off, defended right back to him
on a length, shaping in towards off, defended form the crease
on a length, just outside off, shapes back in. Defended from the crease again
nice length again, and gets some tail back in towards off. Defended back to him
fuller, drawing him forward. Handscomb can't be adventurous against this accurate bowling. Defends
solid length ball shaping in towards off again. Defended solidly too
loose drive on the up outside off, and Vijay misfields again at point. Just takes his eye off early. Ishant denied a maiden. Would have been his second this session
lovely cover drive. Jadeja pitches up, and Smith uses his wrists, just beaching them at the last moment to keep this down and place it to the left of extra cover
flighted outside off, defended
tossed up full, driven to mid-off
flatter, slight turn, and Smith defends off the back foot
draws a forward defensive with a flighted delivery just outside off
flighted outside off, and pushed to long-off for an easy single
shuffles across to a length ball outside off, and then leaves it alone as it holds its line
again moves across to defend a length ball outside off
full and straight, excitement among the fielders as Smith moves across, but the bat comes down in time and gets him a single past midwicket
on a length, holds its line outside off, defended solidly by Handscomb
full, swinging away a touch, defended from the crease
on a length, on off, holds its line, Handscomb has been tied down by Ishant. This is a good spell from him
this one stays low. Short of a length, hits the dark patch, stays low, but Smith manages to get an inside edge onto the pad. This is really really close and dangerous
overpitched, driven to deep cover for one
goes back to a flat delivery. The ball stops and turns. Handscomb defends with soft hands
shimmies down the wicket, Jadeja pulls back the length, and he has to defend
full, on off, driven to short straight cover
down the wicket, beaten in the flight again, but defends with bat and pad close together. Half a shout
short of a length, just outside off, defended to leg
on a length, outside off, holds its line, defended to cover
gets a push-drive going but can't beat the man at cover
on a length, just outside off, Smith shuffles across to defend
full, swinging in, Smith still goes across to defend from the crease

runs off the thick outside edge. Not entirely in control but Smith controls it well with soft hands. This is a length ball that shapes away from him, and he plays it with soft hands. Goes wide of two slips, and along the ground, for four

good shot, and a great chase from Kohli, showing his team-mates you can catch up with these balls. Handscomb down the wicket to push this wide of mid-on. Kohli puts in an excellent chase on this quick outfield. In the end Kohli puts in a dive too to save the boundary but seems to have jammed his finger into the turf. Kohli seems to have injured his shoulder
full and outside off, driven to short cover
on a length, on off, defended solidly
full, driven straight to short straight cover
uses his wrists to drive one to short cover
on a length, straighter this time, and defended back to Jadeja
short of a length, outside off, defended from the crease
cashes in to the loose ball. Short of a length and wide with no third man. He late-cuts it to the left of point for four
fuller, on off, defended back to him
full, swinging in, pushed to cover
short of a length, outside off, steered to deep point for one
on a length, straight, defended to short midwicket
length ball, outside off, driven on the up, gets a single to deep cover
on a length, just outside off, defended off the front foot
slower in the air, 89ks, defended back to him
another front-foot defence as Jadeja pitches up without giving him the driving length
down the wicket to drive this hard to mid-on where Abhinav misfields. They were taking the single anyway
full, outside off, driven to extra cover
full, middle and leg, Smith moves across to clip it away to deep square leg. That brings up his fifty. He gets a healthy sitting ovation from his balcony

Umesh produces a wicket. Full late-swinging yorker. Handscomb is hit on the toe, and he walks off once given. The bat of Handscomb is coming down the right line, but he fails to get the front foot out of the line in time. This is unlike Smith who doesn't get his front foot in the way to avoid these lbws. Once again, after looking good, Handscomb fails to make another innings count. Top bowling from Umesh
full, swinging in, defended outside off
Umesh tries the bouncer now. Outside off, and he stays inside the line
short of a length, just outside off, pushed back to him
full, just outside off, defended to cover
and Smith obliges by turning the first ball around the corner to bring Maxwell on strike
nice drift and dip, and Maxwell defends off the front foot
tosses this up generously, and Maxwell drives it back to Ashwin
hard hands, uppishly down the ground to get off the mark with a single to long-on
full, really full, dug out by Smith
short of a length, Smith goes back to whip it to deep midwicket for one
full, swinging in, worked off the pads for a single to long leg
full, outside off, driven hard but straight to Umesh
short of a length, outside off, pushed with an open face for a single
late swing, creates excitement with Smith moving across, but the bat always comes down in time. Gets a single to deep midwicket
full and wide, 142ks, driven with an open face for a single to deep point
lovely shot from Smith. Any other batsman gets just a single off this ball but Smith moves across the line to get inside the line of this and glances this fine for four
flat, on a length, straight, defended off the front foot
slight shimmy down the wicket to work this full ball to long-on for one
tossed up outside off, slight drift away, defended off the front foot
front-foot defence as Ashwin gets some dip outside off
flatter, no turn, and it runs off his outside edge past slip. Smith playing back and with soft hands
flighted outside off, defended solidly off the front foot
late swing, tailing in towards middle and leg. Maxwell's bat comes down in time, and comes down straight
on a length, on off, defended from the crease
short of a length, straight, worked through square leg for one
length ball outside off, Smith shuffles across to open the face late to get a single to third man
on a length, reversing in, Maxwell defends to mid-on
appeal for lbw as Maxwell moves across again and misses. Hits him in front of leg. Not given. They get a leg-bye. Going down
flighted outside off, smothers the turn
nice dip on this, and gets turn to hit him high on the bat
sees the flatter trajectory and goes back. Ashwin bowls full, and Maxwell just gets the bat down in time
big lbw shout and India don't review. Maxwell playing with fire here. Just turning too much as it beats the inside edge
forward defensive from Smith
flatter, and Smith goes back to defend
length ball, angling too far down, concedes a leg-bye
well played. Similar ball to the one that got Handscomb, but Smith's front toe is out of the way and he keeps this out. Smith nods to Umesh in acknowledgement of a good delivery
length ball, he shuffles across to clip it to midwicket
on a length, tailing in towards off, and he defends with a solid straight bat
short of a length, around that off again, defended to leg
low full toss, swinging back in, pushed to cover
down the wicket, reaches this on the half-volley, drives it back to Ashwin
flat wide length ball, defended with an open face
nice dip outside off, Maxwell defends off the front foot
goes back to a length-ball offbreak, the ball rips back, takes a thick inside edge and goes past short leg
stays back to defend a length-ball offbreak
goes back to punch this one but can't beat the man at point
loose drive, gets a thick outside edge, takes a single
on a length, just outside off, defended off the front foot
down the wicket, whips one to leg, but can't beat the man at midwicket
full, too full, driven to deep cover for one
short of a length, outside off, punched to deep cover for one
front-foot defensive to end the over. The ball doesn't turn and hits the inside half of the bat
short, Maxwell goes back to punch this to long-on
short of a length again, worked to leg for an easy single
tossed up outside off, he gets to its pitch an opens the face to get a single past point
flat, Smith goes back, defends this to leg
tossed up outside off, solid front-foot defensive
down the wicket, hits it straight to mid-off and pinches a single to Vijay
tossed up outside off, defended off the front foot
short of a length, outside off, punched to the left of extra cover for one

short of a length, down the leg side, goes for a leg-bye. Jadeja appeals but this is clearly missing leg. Umpire tells Jadeja to stay off the wicket. Remember Jadeja once cost India five runs by running on the pitch
short of a length, into the pads, whipped into the leg side
full, just outside off, pushed to cover
nice dip and turn here. Smith defends watchfully
too full, driven to long-on for one
tossed up wide, Smith drives against the turn, the ball runs off the outside half of the bat to point
full outside off again, and Smith drives this hard to the left of mid-off. Says no to the single
flatter but still full, and Smith defends off the back foot
nice drift away, turns back in, and Smith is equal to it in defence
nice dip and drift, and Smith is hit on the inside half of the bat as he defends
short of a length, outside off, punched to the left of cover, and Rahul saves three runs with the dive
full, middle and off, Smith defends this back to him
short of a length, into the pads, worked against the turn. Vijay looking better in the field now. He swoops in from deep square leg to keep them down to one
full, quick, defended back to him
half-volley on the pads, pushed wide of mid-on for one
on a length, outside off, driven to long-off for a single
down the wicket, too close to the ball, and can't beat short midwicket
back to a length-ball offbreak but the bat still comes down in time
tossed up outside off, driven against the turn, between mid-off and cover. Vijay puts a careful belated five, but still saves three runs
direct hit from Jadeja from extra cover. Maxwell goes for that sharp single, Jadeja throws on the bounce, and the throw loses all its pace in that bounce. They get another run off the overthrow
too full and driven to long-on for one
Ashwin goes wide, and bowls just short of a length. Smith delays his shot and sends it crashing past cover. Half square drive, half back cut
lbw appeal first ball but this seems like it is going down. India review the not-out call, and this is anyway a no-ball. I don't think India will lose this review but I could be wrong
short of a length, outside off, steered to third man for one
back and across to a straight length ball, defended to leg. Misfielded by Pujara at short midwicket
full, shaping away outside off, defended from the crease
full, on the pads, clipped away to deep square leg
short of a length, wide, Smith looks to punch at it, and the ball tails back in to hit the inside half of the bat
wide length ball, Smith shuffles across to defend
on a length, outside off, defended off the front foot
full, just outside off, defended with an open face, gets a single towards point
on a length, on off, no turn, defended back to him
flighted outside off, pushed to cover
full, outside off, and Smith becomes the seventh-fastest to 5000 runs. Seventh-fastest in terms of innings, and third-fastest in terms of matches played
flat, middle and off, defended back to him
full, swinging in, defended from the crease
shapes back in off a length, Smith defends from the crease
short of a length, a set of stumps outside off, and Smith is still a little cramped up because of his movement across. So he defends
full, just outside off, Smith right behind it in defence
on a length, just outside off, Smith back and across to defend
full and wide, Smoith gets in line with his shuffle across and dives this between short cover and mid-off. Great placement, and the outfield does the rest
fired in outside leg, and Saha makes the collection
too far down leg again, and Saha does well again
pads one away as Jadeja gets closer to leg
full outside leg, and he kicks it away
pads away another delivery outside leg
nearly a yorker on leg, Maxwell keeps it out
short and wide, and it stays low to beat his cut
full, swinging in, defended towards mid-on
wide length ball, Smith right behind it in defence
short of a length, wide, and he steers it to the right of third man for a four. Can't bowl that with no point or deep point
fuller, still wide, and pushed to extra cover
wide length ball, defended solidly
full, on off, defended solidly
flatter, outside off, punched to deep point where the man from deep cover runs around and fields
is that the luck Smith needed? Horrible-looking shot. Down the wicket, not close to the pitch of the ball, and still completes an ungainly shot. He is lucky this has not carried to mid-on
back to watchful defence
another forward-defensive to one pitched up outside off
wristy push to a length ball, finds the man at cover
short of a length, wide, Maxwell doesn't go after it
short of a length, wide, punched towards deep point for a couple
full and straight, hits the outside half of the bat as he defends
length ball on the pads, clipped away to long leg
right behind the line of a wide length ball
wide length ball, he is right behind it again
and there is Maxwell's first boundary. Lovely clean swing of the bat to send a full ball right back over Jadeja's head
short of a length, on the stumps, and punched away to deep point for one
length ball outside off, defended off the front foot
nice use of the wrists to keep this cover drive down. Gets a single to deep cover
full, some dip, defended off the front foot
on a length, on off, holds its line, defended back to him
short of a length, outside off, Smith cramped on that punch and ends up playing it back to Ishant
full, swinging in, Smith right behind it outside off
short of a length, angling in, worked to midwicket
finally manages to beat Smith's bat but this is headed down leg. Smith hardly misses a straight ball
on a length, angling in towards off. Solid in defence
wide length ball, defended to cover. First maiden of this session
driven on the up, past point for a single
beaten in the air but he can afford to defend with hard hands because there is no silly point or short leg in place
short of a length, stops at him a little, bounces at him too. Defended well
full outside off, defended
another single pinched to Vijay at mid-off
flat length ball, Maxwell defends from the crease
half-volley, driven to the right of mid-off for one
full, middle and leg, pushed to short midwicket
short of a length, Maxwell goes back to punch, Ashwin puts in a dive to his right to prevent a single
down the wicket, beaten in flight, and kicks this away outside off
down the wicket again, beaten in the flight again, but manages to play a forward defensive
goes back to work a flat delivery past short leg for a single
stays back to a length ball and defends to cover-point
goes back again, Jadeja fires in a length ball, and he manages to keep it out
stays back to a full ball again. Again he manages to keep it out
stays back again and opens the face on a flat and wide length ball. Goes past point, and Umesh Yadav has to put in a big chase. Lovely chase, and a slide in the end
full, on off, defended back
short of a length, straight, worked to leg for a single
nice drift. Length ball outside off, hits the outside half of the bat
front-foot defensive without reaching the pitch of the ball
full, hit too hard to mid-off, and says no to the single
overpitched, driven to long-on for one
short of a length, outside off, punched down to long-on for one
too full, driven square on the off side, gets a couple to enter 90s
goes back to punch wide length ball to deep cover
short of a length, straight, worked into the leg side for an easy single
stays back to punch a length ball to extra cover
goes back to defend a straight length ball
finally he moves forward as Jadeja tosses one up. Defends
forward to a flatter delivery too, defended it to leg
short of a length, worked around the corner for one
tossed up outside off, Maxwell smothers the turn
full, pushed wide of mid-off for one
overpitched, and driven to long-on for another single
nice dip, makes Maxwell defend without getting to the pitch of the ball. He keeps it down, though
full and wide outside off, driven to deep point for one
dropped it? Again Maxwell goes back to a full ball, and is beaten. No edge. The illusion of the edge is created by his bat hitting his pad. Saha doesn't collect it cleanly
full, outside off, defended
again he goes back to a full ball, the bat comes down in time, but India getting excited about it
tossed up on off, solid front-foot defensive now
flat, middle and leg, worked to leg for one. Maxwell's highest score in Tests
flighted outside off, defended
really slow in the air, defended to leg
tossed up high, draws a loose drive, and runs off the inside half of the bat to wide long-on for a couple
stays back to defend a length ball
wide half-volley, beautifully driven between mid0off and cover for only his second boundary in close to 90 balls
short, outside off, cut to deep point for one
full, driven to short straight midwicket
full, outside off, pushed to extra cover
down the wicket, pushes this to extra cover
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, lunges desperately to get bat on ball outside off
Maxwell reaches his maiden Test fifty with a six. He has not manufactured a shot. He has seen a long hop early and pulled it over midwicket. That's hundred for this partnership too
flighted outside off, and defended solidly
full, down the leg side, nicely ticked away fine of long leg for a couple
full, tailing in, driven, but the extra cover is straight for exactly that shot
length ball, swinging in, worked to deep midwicket for one
full, swinging in, not alarmingly. Driven to mid-on
that is the most balls faced by Maxwell in an international innings. Short of a length, straight, and defended back to him
full, just outside off, left alone. And that's a Cowan for Maxwell. Who would have thought?
short of a length, outside off, punched to the straight extra cover
full, outside leg, defended back
full, outside leg, clipped to midwicket
wider on the crease, on a length, outside leg, defended back to him
flatter, short of a length, worked around the corner for one
outside leg, no turn, and Saha has to collect
at the stump, defended to extra cover
full, holds its line outside off, defended from the crease
full, outside off, driven back to Umesh
short of a length, straight, defended to mid-on
lovely whip. Full, shaping in, he gets the front leg out of the way and flicks it to deep midwicket
wide on the crease, short of a length, on off, defended back to him
tries the bouncer, it remains low, and Maxwell still goes ahead with the pull. Abhinav in the deep goes the wrong way and concedes four
length ball, outside leg, kicked away
Smith pads up to another length ball outside leg
full, outside leg, driven to mid-off after opening up the front leg
quick, on a length, turning towards leg stump. Defended
on a length, outside leg, defended to leg
a forward defensive to end the over
catch is the call as he pulls a loosener in the air but it is wide of square leg and gets him four
short of a length, into the pads, works this fine, and takes a couple. Vijay not happy with the long leg fielder, Abhinav
on a length, outside off, defended off the front foot
too full, but it is a yorker, and is dug out
nice, lets this straight offbreak turn and tickles it fine of fine leg for a couple
down the wicket, drives against the turn, all along the ground, and straight to extra cover
gets extra bounce and turn, keeps it down
pads one outside leg away

what a scene this is. The ball is lodged between Smith's pads after hitting his inside edge. It is dead ball but Saha looks to pull it from there and take catch. Smith tries to take it away, and he tumbles in the process. Presumably to make sure the ball hits the ground but without looking to do deliberately. Saha keeps chasing the ball. Guys it is a dead ball. In the end they end up in a position that cannot be described on Cricinfo comms. Correction: no edge there
full, middle and leg, driven to mid-off
short of a length, defended
full, middle and leg, another solid defensive
flat, into the pads, worked away for one
on a length, outside off, turning in, hits the inside half of the bat
full, outside off, Smith gets off 97 with a single to deep point
short of a length, hit back to him
drives the ball to extra cover for a sharp single
flighted outside off, watchfully defended back
just outside leg, defended to short leg
tossed up outside leg, kicked away
short of a length, outside leg, punched back to Jadeja

wider on the crease, kicked away, India shout for a pad-bat catch but there is no bat or glove involved. Whoa, replays much later show the ball kissed the glove after hitting the pad and lobbed to slip. Maxwell would have been out had India reviewed

phew. That is a way around Jadeja's over-the-wicket line. Is Maxwell going to reach his century before Smith? He goes inside out to a length ball outside leg, and smashes it back over his head for a six. Dead straight
full, outside leg, padded back to him
short of a length, on off, and he works to leg to reach 99
short of a length, wide, cut away to deep point for one
length ball, kicks at him, and hits him high as he defends
short of a length, stays low, good diving save by Nair at short midwicket to keep him on 99

he is the only man to have scored a century this series, and he makes it two now. Full ball, middle and leg, and he drives this straight of mid-on for four. He is just content. He is not angry after what all has gone around him and against him. He just removes his helmet and gracefully accepts the applause
full, on off, defended back to him
fired down the leg side, and Saha collects
flighted outside off, defended back to him
shout for lbw as Maxwell looks to reverse. This seems like headed down, and India don't review it
lovely shot but a misfield at cover. Tired legs and minds in the field. Smith down the wicket, takes this on the half-volley, drives it against the turn, and it squeezes under Jadeja's dive
forward-defensive back to Ashwin
nice drift outside off, but Smith plays with soft hands and takes a couple off the outside edge
full, swinging in late, gives it the full face to drive it to mid-on
length ball, straight, defended to mid-on
full, outswinger this time, nearly a yorker, dug out by Maxwell
length ball outside off, Maxwell defends with an open face
driven on the up but straight to mid-off
wide on the crease, gets it to hold its line outside off. Defended off the front foot
short of a length, pitched outside leg, punched to midwicket
tossed up on middle and off, solidly defended
vertical sweep as Ashwin pitches this right up and well outside leg. Fine leg can never be fine enough for these. He has not connected this, but he will take the four runs off the glove
short of a length, outside leg, worked around the corner for one
smothers the turn on this full ball
Ashwin places this expertly between the keeper and the leg slip. Full, outside leg, and it turns away sharply. Asking too much of Saha there
whipped away off the stumps for a single to deep square leg
full, nearly a yorker, dug out back to Umesh
driven on the up, wide of mid-on, gets a single. That is 150 for the partnership
full, swinging away a touch, driven to mid-off
wide length ball, and Smith allows it to go through to the keeper
length ball, outside off, defended off the back foot
short of a length, well outside off, left alone
wide length ball, left alone again
fuller, closer to off, Maxwell drives on the up, and gets a thick outside edge fine of third man for four. That is ordinary from KL Rahul. Heavy legs, slow to bend. Two extra runs conceded
short of a length, on off, drops it at his toes and takes a single
wide length ball, left alone
full, driven straight of mid-on, Pujara puts a dive in to save two runs
on a length, on off, defended from the crease
length ball on the pads, but he has found midwicket. Umesh gets away with the four ball
on a length, straight, defended to leg
good bouncer, good gas, 137ks, head high, and Maxwell pulls out after initially shaping up for the pull
another bouncer, 135ks, more loopy, and Maxwell quick to duck out
nicely played. Slower ball, short of a length, Maxwell gets behind it and then steers it to third man for one
loose shot. Looks to run this down to third man again, but it angles back in to beat to cramp him. Misses the edge, though
driven on the up but straight to cover-point. The sound off the bat is sweet
fuller, angling in, runs off the inside half of the defensive bat for a single
on a length, on off, defended from the crease
full, just outside off, defended to leg
solid defence to end this day with a stamp of his own. The first session of the series where Australia haven't lost a wicket. Only the second such on either side

the bat has broke. Maxwell is left with just the handle in his hand. Maxwell defends a length ball - 137ks - properly. The ball hits the upper third, and the bat is gone. Even his bat is not used to being used for so long
short of a length, on off, defended with an open face
bouncer, middle and leg, he sways inside its line
short of a length, stays low, is accurate, but Maxwell equal to it, and keeps it out. Hazlewood will be interested in these deliveries
short of a length, outside off, no pace, pushed to mid-off
and after a decent start, Umesh gives him a wide length ball, which he drives square through the vacant point region to bring up the first 300 of the series
full and wide, left alone
short of a length, outside off, defended with an open face
wide length ball with no third man. Smith drives with an open face, and gets a thick edge for four. Half edgy, but half intended
short of a length, wide outside off, punched to deep cover for one
full, on off, Maxwell could have driven this down the ground, but he defends, looking to get his eye in
bouncer, just outside off, and he stays away from it
length ball, outside off, kicks at him a little, Smith drops his hands a little and takes a single to point
wide length ball, driven on the up, straight to cover
short of a length, middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
short of a length, straight at him, defended back to Umesh

bouncer, just outside off, Maxwell ducks it. Reminiscent how on the first of the England series, India didn't bounce Moeen, and then on day two they started it. Players not thinking on their feet? Why should it take overnight to use a tactic?
bouncer that stay low. Headed for the rib cage, but because Maxwell's first instinct is to go for the pull he can get the bat up in time and pull down on this for a single
wide length ball again with no third man. Not a smart tactic. Maxwell plays with an open face, but it runs off the edge for four. Maxwell into his 90s
slightly short of a length, outside off, pushed to deep point for one
on a length, straight, Smith shuffles across and defends to leg
short of a length, wide outside off, punched to cover
on a length, around the sixth-stump line, defended after moving across
another no-ball from Ishant. On a length, outside off, and defended watchfully
short of a length, just outside off, defended back to him
short of a length, straight, pushed to mid-on
again short of a length, just outside off, defended to cover
short ball, takes an eternity to arrive, Maxwell looks to leave it alone but sees the ball is still there so he tries a little ramp, and is beaten
way down the leg side, Maxwell throws his hands at it, but he would have needed a ladder to make a connection
on a length, outside off, opens the face, plays with soft hands, and comes back for two even as the man at deep point fields
and he ramps this time. Umesh tries another short ball outside off. Even this takes an age to arrive. This time Maxwell lays bat on it, pushing it over gully for four
on a length, on off, slight straightening of the line, defended with an open face
on a length, middle and off, turns towards off, defended back to him
middle and leg this time, Smith opens up the front leg to defend this back to Jadeja
slightly quicker, slightly outside off, defended to cover
fuller, middle and off, pushed back to Jadeja
tossed up, middle and leg, turning towards off, defended back to him. The first maiden of the day
full, swinging in, punched to mid-off
slower ball. Smart bowling. Maxwell watching it like a hawk, though. Defends off the middle of the bat
good bouncer. Aimed at his throat, and this one too doesn't get as high as it should from that length. It also follows him as he sways out of its line
draws the loose shot. The sucker ball after the bouncer. Maxwell tries the big drive, and the edge flies wide for a single. India have a third man now
down the leg side, and Smith misses out on runs there
bouncer well outside off, Smith doesn't follow it
on a length, middle, defended from the crease
flat, he goes back to punch it, but the field is up, and he won't get an easy single
middle and leg, bunted into the leg side, Smith is ready to run but Maxwell says no
flat, short of a length, defended to leg as it stays a touch low

turn, sharp turn. This one goes away from just outside off. Maxwell quick to pull the bat inside the line. Jadeja appeals, but this is not given as there is daylight and a half between the bat and ball
consecutive maidens for Jadeja as Maxwell punches this quick delivery straight to cover
full, just outside off, punched to mid-on
on a length, sixth-stump line, defended to cover
wide on the crease, length ball angling in, defended back to him
short of a length, into the hip, pulled away to long leg for one
short of a length, middle and leg, pushed to mid-on

Maxwell has cut this fiercely to bring up a superlative maiden Test hundred. Short of a length, wide, and he has lashed this between the two slips. It has flown away. He is pumped. Smith is overjoyed for him too. Maxwell removes his helmet and kisses the badge on it
full, outside off, driven to extra cover
on a length, outside off, driven square but can't beat the fielder at point
defends one with an open face
slower in the air, straight, defended back to him
down the wicket, kicks this away, there is half a shout for pad first. The ball has hit the pad first, but the ball is pitched outside off, and is turning away
short of a length, and punched to cover. Jadeja has bowled three straight maidens today
full, outside off, pushed to cover
on a length, angling in, defended back to him
full, swinging in, driven off the inner half of the bat
full and straight, flicked away for a couple. Ishant not at the stumps to collect the throw. India need to regroup here. Missed an easy run-out
short of a length, outside off, inside-edged into his toe
on a length, outside off, defended back to him
on a length, on off, defended to cover

and Maxwell falls soon after getting to a hundred. And it's that man Jadeja again. Jadeja this morning: 20 balls, no runs, and now a wicket of the centurion. This is short of a length, Maxwell shapes up for the punch, but there is a puff of dust where it pitches before it turns away to take the edge. Good catch by Saha
short of a length, defended to short leg
looks for the paddle sweep but telegraphs the move. Jadeja bowls wide outside off, and he misses. They get a bye off Saha's pad
flighted outside off, driven to cover
middle and leg, on a length, defended off the inside half of the bat
Wade moves across to clip one off the pads for a single to long leg
falls short of Saha. Wide length ball, Smith goes for the big punch, gets an edge but it reaches Saha on a half-volley even though Saha is diving forward. Good sportsmanship from Saha. Doesn't appeal
full, on off, defended to mid-on
full, on off, he clears the front leg and whips this away through square leg. That's an incredible shot
short of a length, outside off, defended back to him

wide length ball, it is going between cover and extra cover, but Pujara and Umesh Yadav dive into each other, and the ball rolls away harmlessly for four. Funny but only because nobody got injured here
full, outside off, defended to leg
on a length, outside off, he moves across and lets it hit his pad
short of a length, he shuffles across to defend
short of a length, shuffles across to defend
flat length ball outside off, Wade is back and across to defend
and Wade shuts me up by skipping down the track and driving this all along the ground, and between short midwicket and mid-on
short of a length, wide, punched to deep point for one
length ball, into the pads, pushed to square leg
on a length, straight, defended to mid-on
on a length, on off, defended to mid-off
on a length, angling in towards off, defended to mid-off
short of a length, on off, defended
on a length, on off, defended back to him
on a length, outside off, opens the face and gets a single in front of point
stays back to bunt this length ball into the covers for one
on a length, on off, kicks at him, hits the high part of the bat
on a length, outside off, pushed to cover for one. So India have now gone in-and-out. In the first hour, this was not yielding singles
short of a length, outside off, defended back to Jadeja
short of a length, on off, he shuffles across to push this to deep midwicket for one
short of a length, angling in, defended back to him
long half-volley. This won't help India. Wade drives this through cover for four. All along the ground. Such bowling might hasten the process of going in-and-out with the fields
pushed wide of mid-off, to the right of the left-handed Jadeja, for a single
another long half-volley, and this time India have a deep cover to keep them down to one
short of a length, angling in from round the wicket, defended off the back foot

short of a length, on the pads, punched past midwicket and they take three when they should have taken two. They take on Ishant's arm successfully. Rahane quiet. Kohli would have thrown a rocket Ishant's way, that's for sure
four byes. Not good signs for India. Not these runs, but the fact that the ball has hit the rough, disturbed the top surface and turned and bounced to beat both Wade and Saha
flighted outside off, he gets across to smother the turn
swept powerfully for a single to deep square leg
full, on the pads, pushed to short straight cover
fired outside leg, Smith lets it hit his pad
really well played. Short of a length, outside off, holds its line, and Wade opens the face of his bat to steer it past slip and into the vacant third man region
short of a length, outside off, left alone
wide length ball, Wade doesn't follow this one
full, angling in from wide on the crease, Wade takes a single to wide of mid-on
on a length, angling in, pushed past midwicket for one
bouncer, angling in to him, and Wade pulls out after shaping up for the hook
padded away again
full, outside leg, defended back to him
tossed up outside leg, defended in front of leg
sharp turn but that's from the rough. Smith stays inside its line and lets Saha do the rest
short of a length, outside leg, tickled wide of short fine for a single
shuffles across, beaten in the flight, the ball turns to take the inside edge but it goes safely for a single to square leg
short of a length, outside off, defended with an open face
the premeditated lap sweep, gets a couple fine of fine leg
some drift into the pads, defended to leg
down the wicket, not exactly to its pitch but chips it over midwicket for four
on a length, on off, stays back to defend
short of a length, outside off, punched to deep cover for one
looks to sweep, beaten
full and wide, he is glued to the crease but opens the face to get a single
outside leg, and he pads it away
sharp turn but from the rough outside his leg stump. Smith stays inside the line
stays back to develop a flat length ball
stays back to work a quick delivery around the corner for one
flat straight length ball. Defended from the crease
into the pads again, tickled away for a single to leg
on a length, middle and leg, defended to leg
down the wicket to take this on the full and clip it past square leg for a four all along the ground
on a length, middle and leg, defended back to him
nice drift into the pads, pushed back to Ashwin
full outside leg, and kicked away
full, just outside leg, defended back to him
short of a length, flicked off the hip for a single. Rahul makes a diving save at short fine leg
short of a length, turn from rough outside off, punched to mid-off
lovely powerful sweep from outside off. Takes this on the half-volley, and nails this. Beats deep square leg too
nicely bowled. Dip, and then turn from the rough. The ball hits the inside edge and flies past short leg
stays back to defend a length ball to point
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, and he defends to leg
short of a length, into the pads, punched past midwicket, and they respect Jadeja and take only a single
full and straight, defended from the crease
tossed up outside off, played back to Ashwin
full, on the pads, flicked to square leg
looks for the sweep, the ball rolls along, Saha whips the bails off, but his back foot is in the crease
swept away now, but they have a deep midwicket now
some turn from the rough but this time Smith opens the face to get a single

Jadeja has another wicket. He is keeping India alive single-handedly. Jadeja keeps hitting the rough on a length, and this one explodes from the pitch to go straight on as opposed to turning as expected. Wade edges this to be caught by Saha
on a length, just outside off, defended off the front foot

what a beauty from Jadeja. This is sensational bowling. A left-arm bowler's dream ball, but this will worry India too. This is on a length, on middle and leg, drawing a forward-defensive from Cummins. The ball then turns away to beat the outside edge and hit the top of off. No puff of dust here
on a length, into the pads, defended to leg
overpitched, driven to long-on for one
short of a length, wide outside off, misses on the punch
slower in the air, he presses forward to get a single off the outside half of the bat
flighted outside off, defended back to him
short of a length, outside off, bunted for a single that brings up Smith's 150. He raises his bat to everyone. Magnificent batting
Jadeja nearly gets Smith too. Turns sharply from over the wicket and outside leg. Smith defends with soft hands. The edge reaches the slip on half-volley
down the wicket to whip this to leg. Smith wants two, O'Keefe is slow, and Ishant's throw from the deep is slower
full, on the pads, pushed towards long-off for one
on a length, on off, defended back to him
on a length, drifting in, defended back to him
and kicked away after it pitches outside leg. Jadeja puts in a half shout
on a length, on off, defended from the crease
tossed up, outside off, driven to long-on for one
some drift outside off, O'Keefe defends off the front foot
on a length, outside off, slow off the surface. Defended from the crease
nice flight and dip, O'Keefe smothers the turn
defended off the front foot, back to Ashwin
full outside leg, defended back to him
full, middle and leg this time, and he drives this uppishly to long-off for one
full, straight, driven to mid-off
wider on the crease, pitched on a length, outside leg, defended back to him
too full, easily smothered by O'Keefe
flighted on off, driven to mid-off
misses out. This is shorter, flatter and wider. He is beaten on the cut
on a length, on off, defended back
flat, straight, punched to long-on
shimmies down the wicket to defend this one
flat length ball, defended from the crease
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, and he defends this back to Ashwin
full, middle and leg, defended back to him

short of a length, pitched outside leg, misfielded at short midwicket. This is where India are missing Kohli, who would have let it rip at Pujara for this sloppy effort. However, you can't expect a stand-in captain to be so assertive
flighted outside off, driven to mid-off
on a length, flat, defended off the front foot
they moved that gully to short mid-off last over. Jadeja slows this down, draws turn but without any puff of dust. It hits the edge, and goes wide of slip
short of a length, outside leg, punched away but can't beat midwicket
flat, short of a length, defended to leg
short of a length, outside off, O'Keefe throws his hands at it, and the edge flies over Rahane's hand. Catchable but would be extremely harsh to call this a drop
down the wicket and drives this straight to mid-on
full, just outside off, defended to short straight midwicket
flicked to short straight midwicket again
overpitched, pushed to mid-off
lovely shot. Making sure Jadeja is not allowed to bowl that defensive line outside leg. Just too full, and he has driven it against the turn, past midwicket
on a length, outside leg, worked past square leg for one
fired into the pads, and he lets it hit his pad
kicks out one tossed up outside leg
kicks away another ball pitched outside leg
short of a length, pitched outside leg, defended back to him
down the wicket, Ashwin fires it into the pads, and he still clips it away for a single to deep midwicket
full, into the pads, clipped to short straight midwicket
long half-volley from Ashwin, and O'Keefe has driven this right back over his head. Ashwin looking to get him forward but overpitches a little
quicker, flatter, defended from the crease
short of a length, straight bat to defend this to short straight midwicket
carrom ball, pitches middle and off, and holds its line. Doesn't bother O'Keefe, who seems to have picked it
fired full outside leg, driven to short cover
sharp turn from the rough. Smith doesn't follow it with his hands
flighted outside leg, defended back
short of a length, outside leg, worked wide of midwicket for one. This is now the sixth-highest score by a visiting captain in India
big lbw shout but no review after Gould shakes his head. It is a quick length ball that beaten his forward defensive. This one doesn't turn, but takes the inside edge before hitting the pad
forward defensive to end the over
full, easy single to long-on
flighted outside off, defended with an open face
sharp dip and turn, but it is outside off, and O'Keefe has got outside the line when hit on the pad
quicker sharper offbreak, and it takes the inside edge as O'Keefe goes back. Inside edge onto the pad and past Saha's gloves
flighted outside off, defended
another forward defensive but nice to see Ashwin go side-on and put so much action on the ball
length ball, outside leg, pushes this towards long-off for a single
down the wicket, Jadeja fires it in, and he plays the defensive shot
short of a length, outside off, uses his soft hands to defend this to slip on the bounce
flatter, quicker, O'Keefe picks it early and absolutely nails this cut for a four
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, but O'Keefe defends well
a solid front-foot defensive to end the over
on a length, outside off, defended
wide length ball, driven to deep cover for one
short of a length, outside off, sticks in the surface, defended to cover
hiding the ball, gets it to tail away, O'Keefe follows it, edges it past slip
short of a length, outside off, keeps it out as it stays low. They get a single
wide on the crease, angling in, punched away off the hip
length ball, outside off, left alone
flat, on a length, defended off the front foot
slight drift back in, hits the inside half of the bat as Smith defends
tossed up outside off, left alone
on a length, on off, no turn, defended off the front foot
solid front-foot defensive as Jadeja bowls a maiden
wide and short, stays low to defeat his cut
wide on the crease, short of a length, punched away, wide of mid-off for a single. Nair misfields at extra cover
on a length, on off, holds its line against the angle. Defended
length ball, into the pads, defended to one of the two short midwickets
short of a length, straight, defended to short midwicket
short ball, rib high, and O'Keefe has pulled this between fine leg and deep forward square leg for four
on a length, turning in towards middle, defended to leg
short of a length, turning in, punched away from off, but not past the man at point
flat, into the pads, defended to leg
full, driven to long-on for one
full, middle and leg, hits the inner half of the bat as he defends
tossed up outside off, defended with an open face
full, outside off, driven to mid-off
wide on the crease, bowled full and wide, driven away with an open face for a single to deep point
on a length, tailing back in, defended off the back foot
full, tailing in, slight reverse, driven to mid-on
slower ball, on a length, middle and leg, defended to leg
short of a length, wide, punched to cover
turning into middle and leg, flicked to right of midwicket where Rahul fumbles to allow them a single
flighted outside off, too full, pushed to cover
full, middle and leg, defended to short mid-on
too full, driven to mid-off, takes a single even though Umesh is up
short of a length, punched to deep cover
topsinner. Less side spin and more bounce to beat his defensive shot and hit him high. The bounce denies him the lbw
wide length ball, pushed to deep cover for one
short of a length, angling in, defended to mid-on
he has helped it along to fine leg. O'Keefe is crossed with himself because he has middled this pull. Short, into the ribs, and he pulls it up and over. Straight to fine leg
full and down the leg side. Saha does the tidying up
solid defensive shot
good swinging yorker, and Lyon is equal to it
full, outside leg, whipped away to deep square for one
full, outside off, solid defensive shot
flatter, on a length, turns to run off the edge for a single
reverse sweep from outside leg, but can't beat the man at point
short of a length, and easily tucked away for a single into the leg side

Jadeja has a five-for. Lovely catch by silly point. Jadeja bowls slow in the air, Lyon defends off the front foot, the ball bounces extra and hits his bat high. Nair is alert to this catch off the middle of the bat
wide length ball, slower I think, and he is beaten
full and wide, turns down the single to deep cover
slower ball, full on off, driven to deep cover. Again no single
wide length ball, Smith looks for the expansive drive, gets an inside edge onto the pad. They steal the single. Fifth-highest score by a visiting captain in India
full, into the pads, sliding down
low full toss, pushed to mid-on
vertical sweep but can't place it fine. Turns down the single
on a length, outside leg, defended back to him

full, on the pads, and Jadeja seems to have managed a run-out here. Let's make this five plus one for Jadeja. Dug out slightly wide of short fine leg. Rahul is a little slow, Smith wants to steal the second. The throw is off target, but Jadeja moves away from his station, collects the throw up the pitch, and with his back to the stumps he back-flicks onto the stumps
full, straight, and he has taken a single straight to mid-on. Very tight single but O'Keefe misses. He would have been in anyway
length ball outside off. Left alone. This is the one that got him in Pune
wide length ball. Vijay happy to get a stride in and leave it alone
closer to off, makes Vijay defend, and hits the outside half of the bat
wide on the crease, angling in, defended back to him
full, just outside off, driven back to Hazlewood
length ball, 143ks, straight, and defended to mid-on
on a length, angling in, defended off the front foot
short of a length, outside off, left alone
length ball, angling in, 144ks, hits the inside half of the bat
short of a length, around the fifth-stumps line, left alone
quick length ball outside off, 145ks, defended off the front foot to end a maiden
big shout for lbw but is going down and bouncing over. On a length, on just outside off, seams back in to beat the inside edge. Hits him high
lovely bowling. Wide on the crease, makes him play the angle, but this one holds its line after pitching and beats the outside edge
fuller this time, nicely defended to mid-off. The ball flies off the bat
bouncer, stays low, pulled off the ribs for a single
short of a length, and they are alert and pinch a single to point
wide on the crease, on a length, around the fifth stump, left alone
short of a length, outside off, 143ks, good carry as it is left alone
wide length ball, left alone
Rahul has no clue about this one. Bouncer at 148k, at his face, and Rahul throws up his hands to protect his face. He does well to get the bottom hand off, though. The ball goes down
length ball, on off, defended back to him
wide length ball, 146ks, seeing if Vijay fancies a drive. he doesn't. Left alone
serious gas from Cummins. Bouncer, right at his melon. Vijay does well to avoid it, and Wade collects it head high
on a length, fifth-stump line, defended from the crease
short of a length, just outside off, defended off the back foot
on a length, just outside off, defended off the back foot
length ball, a set of stumps wide, and left alone
pulled away. This short ball doesn't really get up, and Rahul keeps it down easily
first delivery off target so far, but it slides too far down leg for Vijay to get a touch on it
finally a real loose ball and Rahul takes tool. Clips this off the toes, in the air, past square leg. Lovely shot to close the face so late
short of a length, outside off, left alone
good short ball at 143ks. Rising towards his chest. Rahul rises with it, and keeps this down with the fend
short of a length, down the leg side
accurate length ball, 147ks, defended back to him
short of a length, accurate, defended to cover
pitched up outside off, hits the inside half of the bat on the drive
too full, driven down to long-off for one
solid front-foot defensive to a flighted delivery
flatter, middle and leg, defended back to him
slightly short of a length, and he goes back to bunt this to cover for one
on a length, just outside off, defended off the front foot
lovely shot. Short of a length, outside off, he punches it through cover. All along the ground
fuller, outside off, Rahul drives, and is hit on the inner half of the bat. Inside edge in fact. Too wide, and no feet
bouncer outside off, 144ks, easy to duck
short of a length, outside off, he rises with it, gets a thick outside edge on the defensive shot, and the quick outfield takes it for four to third man. Keeps it down with soft hands
short of a length, pushed wide of cover for a single
short of a length, wide, easy leave, and India go into the break unharmed
on a length, outside off, left alone
fuller, closer to off, defended watchfully
wider on the crease, full and fast. Defended
short of a length, Rahul goes back to cut, but finds the man at point
this time Rahul finds the gap. O'Keefe fires this in short of a length, and he goes back to punch this in front of point. His golden run continues
down the wicket, clipped off his toes, but can't get a single as Marsh makes a diving save at midwicket
wide outside off, makes him defend off the front foot. Vijay does that well
again draws him into a forward-defensive without reaching the pitch of the ball
slightly short of a length, punched off the back foot to short straight midwicket
nice dip, Vijay defends one from the crease
Vijay gets the front pad outside the line off and sweeps this along the ground for one
too full, and he has a long-on in place so they get a single
edged away. Loose shot from Rahul. Defending with hard hands and away from the body. Lunging at it. The edge goes past the lone slip
fuller, middle and off, defended from the crease
really full, middle and leg, dug out by Rahul
no turn, hits the inside edge of the defensive bat. Rahul gets a single
short of a length, Vijay goes back to push this to cover
full, pushes to mid-off and takes off for a single. Warner is deepish there so they make it easily despite the direct hit
flat, on a length, Vijay goes back to defend
tossed up wide outside off, Vijay trusts it to not turn back too much. Left alone
goes back to defend a length ball
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, and he still manages to push it to long-on for one
goes back to an offbreak that turns in towards off and middle. The bat comes down in time for a single around the corner
nice little paddle sweep from well outside off. Gets a single to fine leg
stays back to defend a length ball
on a length, just outside off, solid defensive off the front foot
left alone outside off as he pitches outside off and gets it to turn
short of a length, on off, pushed off the back foot
pitched up outside off, driven well, but straight to cover
slower in the air, higher too, defended off the front foot
on a length, outside off, defended off the back foot
stays back again. This is marginally shorter than good length. He needs to get him forward
higher in the air, draws a forward-defensive, hits the inside half of the bat
flat and quick, Rahul stays back to defend outside off
half-sweep, half-drive. Prepares for the sweep, sees a really full ball, and plays with the back knee off the ground but half day there. Gets a single to deep midwicket
full, just outside off, driven back to Lyon
quick length ball, defended off the back foot
flat length ball, he goes back to work it around the corner for one
full, into the pads, easy single for him
fired into the pads, Rahul goes deep into the crease, and glances it fine
short ball, outside off, rocks back to punch it to the left of deep cover for two
full, slower in the air, Rahul moves forward to smother any turn on it
sweeps, beaten, the ball hits the back of the bat after hitting the pad. No silly point to pouch it
flat, goes back to help it
nice dip outside off, Vijay defends off the front foot
nicely swept after getting outside the line of off
sharp turn. Rahul uses soft hands, and gets a single off the inner half of the bat
on a length, on off, solidly defended back to him
full, just outside off, driven to deep cover for one
flat, on off, holds its line, defended back to O'Keefe
half-volley, driven to long-off for one
length ball, flat, on off, defended in front of his body
goes back to defend a length ball
too full outside off, driven to dee cover
hits the bat high on the forward-defensive
Rahul goes back to work a length ball to leg but can't beat short leg
short of a length, at the stumps, whipped away for a single
tossed up outside off, hits the outside half of the bat as Vijay defends
turn there. From a length and just outside off. Turns past his inside edge to hit the thigh pad
too full this time, and he is driven to long-on for one
big lbw shout. This one seems to have hit a crack and seamed back in, but Vijay has got his front foot outside the line
on a length, tails back in, defended from the crease
wide sucker ball, but Vijay is right behind it, leaning into the drive, and dismisses it to the cover fence. His first boundary in 52 balls
length ball, set of stumps outside off, left alone
slight tail back in. On a length, just outside off, hits the inside half of the bat
left alone outside off as Hazlewood pitches a little too wide
stays back to defend a length ball
short of a length, outside off, he gets behind it, and drops it into the covers for one
on a length, slight turn, defended right back
fired in quicker, Vijay slightly late into the push, and gets a thick outside edge past the slip. Moral victory for Lyon
nicely played. Vijay presses forward, waits for the ball to turn, and goes back to turn it around the corner
tossed up wide outside off, Rahul stretches forward to defend
wide length ball, left alone
there was the straighter one as expected, but Vijay brought his bat down on time for a single to leg
full and straight again, driven to mid-on
edged between the lone slip and gully. After the inswingers, Hazlewood bowls one to hold its line. Rahul stabs at it. Lucky there is just the one slip in place
full, swinging in, picked away off the toes for a couple to deep midwicket
full, outside off, pushed back to him
full, on off, pushed back to Lyon
shapes up to paddle, and carries on with the shot even though Lyon bowls it short
on a length, outside off, defended down by Rahul
powerful sweep from outside off, and on this outfield if you find the gap you get four. Rahul's fourth fifty in five attempts this series. Can he get the big one now?
nice drive against the turn, but can't beat the man at cover
goes back for a length ball, the ball doesn't turn, hits the outside half of the bat
tailing in, clipped away, straight to short midwicket
good bouncer, also well played with minimal movement. Just drops his hands under it
wide on the crease, gets it to hold its line outside off. Vijay not getting drawn into a shot
wide on the crease again, tailing back in, defended off the back foot
gets the reverse back in to middle, Vijay defends with a slightly closed face to short midwicket
inverts the shine, gets it to tail away. Defended back to him
on a length, on off, solid defence off the front foot
full and straight, 139ks, defended with soft hands
on a length, a set of stumps outside off, defended solidly
short of a length, straight, defended to short midwicket
slower-ball but a full toss. Rahul adjusts to it and opens the face to get a single. You want your first slower ball to be on the money. This one isn't
full, straight and fast. Clipped to short midwicket
on a length, tailing back in, defended to short midwicket
bowls the wide sucker ball after setting the field for inswingers. Rahul leaves it alone
wide on the crease, swinging it back in, defended to mid-on
slower ball, offcutter, middle and leg, flicked to short midwicket but keeps it down
short of a length, outside off, nicely placed in front of deep point for a couple. Good early call followed by good running
too straight, and Rahul is alert to it. Hardly ever misses out on these tucks off the pads. Fine leg can not be fine enough for these
short of a length, outside off, soft hands, gets a single square of cover
short of a length, straight, defended to short midwicket
the wide length ball, nearly a repeat of Hyderabad dismissal. Hit on the inside edge as he plays away from the body. Wide enough of the stumps
full, wide, slight tail away, defended back to him
wide on the crease, length ball, just outside off, left alone
wide length ball, he gets a stride in, and leaves it alone
length ball, no turn, hits the pad but going down
too full, driven to long-off for one
on a length, middle and off, defended back to him
another solid front-foot defensive
right forward to defend again
down the wicket, pushes this between the bowler and short cover for a single
short of a length, outside off, no pace, so he has to roll his wrists on this to keep it down
short of a length, skids through and stays low to hit the lower half of the bat
slower ball, short of a length, runs this down to third man for one
bouncer, loopy bounce, easy to duck for Vijay
wide on the crease to spear in a yorker at 145ks. Vijay digs it out
slower ball, short of a length, kicks at him a little. Vijay gets bottom hand off the bat, and wrings it immediately. Possibly got him on the glove
short of a length, easy couple as he punches this wide of midwicket
tossed up on off, defended solidly off the front foot
goes back to a flat delivery, and even though it stays low he has punched this past midwicket for two
full, outside off, pushed to his left. O'Keefe dives, but gets a bad bounce to take it over his hand
short of a length, sits in the surface as he looks to hit this into the covers. Ends up defending
fuller, outside off, pushed to cover
fiery short ball. Rahul just follows it with his hands outside off. Beaten. Collected head high by Wade
short again, but into the body, and tucked away for an easy single
on a length, angling in, Vijay defends from the crease
beaten. Short of a length, outside off, holds its line, draws the loose defensive push. Unlucky to not take the edge
wide length ball, left alone
tries the full and straight one, but slips it down leg and concedes a leg-bye, the first extra of the innings
on a length, on off, defended off the front foot
good length, on off, slight turn, defended off the front foot
slightly short, doesn't quite come on, Vijay looks to nudge it fine but can't create enough distance between the ball and Wade
on a length, defended to cover
slight drift into the pads, makes him defend
flighted outside off, Vijay plays out the maiden defensively
slower ball, on a length, just outside off, defended from the crease

what a beauty from Cummins. He has worked inch by inch for this dismissal, and finally got the edge. Slower bouncer. Rahul sees the line and tries of sway out of its line, but the ball cuts back in to follow his hands, and lobs off the glove for an easy catch for Wade. This is exceptional quick bowling on a flat pitch. For someone playing only his second first-class match in five years, this is really remarkable
full, straight and fast first up. Pujara does well to bring the bat down to help it to square leg
wide length ball, loose defensive push, edges it wide of slip
short of a length, on off, defended from the crease
offcutter, and Pujara leaves it alone. Tight tight leave. Pujara, though, has got a big stride in, and this misses his pad
short of a length, outside off, defended off the back foot
top edge. Premeditated sweep from outside off, and Lyon gets more bounce than he was getting earlier. Sails safely over the keeper
another sweep from outside off, and this time he nails it. All along the ground to square leg
on a length, on off, solid front-foot defensive
fired in and Vijay paddles this fine, using all Lyon's pace. Is Lyon rattled after that sweeping earlier on?
stays back to defend a length ball
wide length ball, positive front-foot defence from Pujara
full, on off, defended to mid-on
